snippet: Serena Williams hopes to salvage what has been a disappointing year (by only her lofty standards) Sunday, looking to win her first Grand Slam title of the year, against Caroline Wozniacki in the United States Open women’s final.
abstract: Serena Williams hopes to salvage what has been a disappointing year (by only her lofty standards) Sunday, looking to win her first Grand Slam title of the year, against Caroline Wozniacki in the United States Open women’s final.

headline.main: U.S. Open 2014: Caroline Wozniacki vs. Serena Williams Live Blog
